titles.title: A bill to provide that the Vietnam Veterans Assistance Fund, Inc. shall be considered as having complied with certain national eligibility requirements for purposes of the 1992 Combined Federal Campaign, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/6/1993--Introduced. Provides that the Vietnam Veterans Assistance Fund, Inc., shall be considered to have complied with certain national eligibility requirements for purposes of the 1992 Combined Federal Campaign.
